pages.text: $(thing)TerraFirmaGreg$() adds a few new crops that can yield a large amount of $(item)Seed Oil$(). This can both be used as Lamp Fuel, as well as $(thing)Bio Diesel$() later on.

pages.name: Wild Sunflower
pages.text: $(thing)Sunflowers$() grow between 5 and 40C, and 100 to 450mm of rainfall. Their seeds can also be roasted and eaten!

pages.name: Wild Canola
pages.text: $(thing)Canola$(), also known as $(thing)Rapeseed$(), grows between -7 and 25C, and 50 to 350mm of rainfall.
